src:
Komisi I DPR Akan Raker Bareng Prabowo Pekan Depan, Bahas Apa?
05 Nov 2019, 06:37 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Komisi I DPR akan menggelar rapat kerja perdana dengan Menteri Pertahanan (Menhan) Prabowo Subianto pada pekan depan. Namun, DPR masih menunggu konfirmasi dengan Kementerian Pertahanan (Kemenhan).
"Direncanakan tanggal 11 November, namun sampai sekarang sekretariat komisi I DPR masih menunggu konfirmasi pihak Kemenhan," kata Ketua Komisi I DPR, Meutya Hafid kepada wartawan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Pembahasan rapat kerja (Raker) bersama Prabowo, dikatakan Meutya mengenai program kerja Kemenhan. "Program kerja Kemenhan," ucap Meutya.
Senada dengan Meutya, anggota Komisi I DPR Charles Honoris mengatakan akan ada Raker perdana dengan Prabowo Subianto pada pekan depan. Tapi agenda pembahasan Raker itu belum diputuskan.
"Sepertinya baru minggu depan. Agenda belum diputuskan," kata Charles.
text:
Commission I of the DPR Will Work Together with Prabowo Next Week, Discuss What?
05 Nov 2019, 06:37 by Faiq Hidayat
Jakarta - Commission I of the DPR will hold a first working meeting with Minister of Defense (Defense) Prabowo Subianto next week. However, the DPR is still waiting for confirmation from the Ministry of Defense (Kemenhan).
"It was planned for November 11, but until now the DPR's Commission I secretariat is still awaiting confirmation from the Ministry of Defense," House Commission I Chairman Meutya Hafid told reporters on Monday (11/04/2019).
Discussing the work meeting (Raker) with Prabowo, Meutya said about the work program of the Ministry of Defense. "The Ministry of Defense's work program," Meutya said.
In line with Meutya, DPR Commission I member Charles Honoris said there would be an inaugural meeting with Prabowo Subianto next week. But the meeting's discussion agenda was not yet decided.
"It looks like it's only next week. The agenda hasn't been decided yet," Charles said.
